title: A normal lake with good scenic view.
review: if you are visiting there to see lake ....not too much to explore because its just a normal lake and boating is available there. but apart from lake the location is very nice. if you are interested to click scenic pictures than its a perfect place.

title: no interest
review: No interest for people looking for nice nature. The lake is dirty, a lot of plastic inside, you can go to the cine 7D (?) and eat and make shopping...

title: Open and Calm
review: This lake is on the way to mussoorie. You can enjoy boating, balloon shooting, scary house and open air here. Nice place to sit and relax

title: Better avoid it!
review: Man made lake with very ugly surrounding and poor quality activities. May be good in summer, I have not experienced.

title: OK OK
review: We visited the lake point.There are so many stairs to reached there.Boating facilities are available.Activities around this place which is children may like.It is paid and you can enjoy the boating only.

title: Average
review: Just an average stop over point if you are travelling up to Mussourie from Dehradun..It offers boating and some eating options

title: Small man-made lake
review: The lake is on way of Dehradun to Mussourie.  The parking is paid.  You need to climb down 70-80 stairs to reach a small pond/lake. The lake is surrounded by shops.  You can boat (30/-per person) or take a ride in zorbing ball (100/- per person) . The zorbing ball is tied to an end so you really don't get to roam around much and the lake is small to enjoy boating too.  The place can be a stop if you have small kids and are on your way to mussourie.

title: Good place to visit in mussoorie
review: Nice place in mussoorie and very small place but refreshing it very much, small small activities is there and very low cost tickets. I like

title: Good pLace for Hills
review: This also is a place before you arrive Mussoorie and this is been surrounded by lots of small food joints and hawkers are been all around the place selling teh local food , Maggie , Bhutta and other stuff

title: Its an Average Location
review: Mussoorie Lake is not a Natural lake. It is men made lake to generate some revenue. Plus point of Mussoorie Lake is adventure zip line provided.

title: WASTE OF MONEY
review: An artifical lake, for which whatever money u spent is waste. such lakse could be find anywhere. Bettter to visit other places then this place.

title: Just a manmade tiny lake n some activities
review: Was there yesterday on 25 March 2019.

title: Zipline was the only reason
review: It's artificial lake. Nothing natural about it. Only worth a while thing here is the Zipline. It's worth the ride.

title: a good place to chil
review: boating and food are two main atractions apart from zing line attraction. the place is good for activities and further new activities are being constricted.

title: Wast of time, effort, money & energy
review: Definitely a place which can be skipped. Nothing to do. You are going there with elderly people please avoid. They have zip-liner activity inside the part @ 350/head.

title: Company garden is better
review: Avoid going to this place unless you have done all the things in mussorie. It is crowded during entire day and on dehradun road.

title: weekend trip
review: very average, nothing to see or do. a small lake that too not well maintained. boating is also unnecessarey in such a small lake.

title: Awesome place to visit on weekends from Delhi
review: Mussoorie is among the best places to visit on weekends from Delhi. It’s just at 6 hour drive when you start in early morning and a beautiful place with awesome weather especially in summers. A paradise for friends to take a break from hectic office life and chill.

title: Not natural lake!
review: I think this is the man made lake and not natural. Very small in size and not a big attraction. Boating facility available, ducks roaming around makes it an okay place if you anyways have to visit.

title: Just a small collection of water
review: Just a small collection of water - nothing more. This can be seen while going to Mussoorie from Dehradun - few kms before. This is not more than a collection of water and timekiller for kids.

title: Average place
review: This is very small artifical lake. This lake is on the way to Mussoorie. This place is good for children visit.

title: A pond !
review: Not an attraction in Mussoorie that one must visit, there are so many other wonderful  things to do in Mussoorie. This is a very small pond, won't call it a lake. Compared to Nainital , this would seem like a pool in the hotel !  There are activities around this place which the children/youngsters may like !

title: Visit to  Lake Mussoorie
review: The lake is very small  in area and way too far from  the  main area of  interest but the  road is good. Not advisable  unless you are  very  much eager to  go.

title: Summer vacation
review: It is good hill station near delhi, near to dehradun, weather is nice in summer. It has good scenic view of Himalayan range

title: Our recent visit here
review: We visited this lake while our visit here. But one has to climb down a large number of stairs to reach near to the lake. The boating facility is available here. But senior persons may face some difficulty at the time of return, as they have to climb up a number of stairs.

title: Not worth
review: Not well maintained, easily accessible from Dehradun Mussoorie road. Not worth time going down the pathway to lake

title: A good tourist spot on way to mussoorie if u like boating.
review: Good boating spot on way to mussoorie. It is located few kms before mussoorie. You have climb down around 150 steps to reach this lake (obviously climb up again while returning). Pedal boats on rent at very cheap rates. Few food joints down there serving all kinds of foods. Nice photos to be clicked.

title: Good to visit ... for first timer
review: Frankly speaking, I didn’t find anything encouraging about this place... man made lake(poorly maintained) with couple of paddle boats( poorly maintained)

title: Lake ???...its a pond!!!
review: The one thing I did not like about Mussoorie...is this pond that is pretending to be a lake...Please skip unless you really have nowhere else to visit!!

title: average
review: this is a small lake when you are going from dehradun to mussoorie...small lake where you can do boating...you have to climb down stairs to reach...can be avoided...

title: For some lazy morning with family!
review: The place is for families to enjoy boating and get lovely photographs for themselves. The Fall supplying water to the lake allows for a beautiful photographs infront of it; The lake is not very wide, but enjoyable nonetheless. And then there are shops around it, which sells all that you could find in Mall Road, Mussorie anyway. The prices are comparitively slightly higher here though. So, my advice would be, paddle some boat, have some snacks, and click some photos to enjoy some lazy couple of hours here.

title: Paragliding easily accessible
review: The descent to Mussorie Lake is very steep. It is not worth the visit. It is not what I want to write about.

title: Average place
review: It is a very small lake or pond. Not so great. Nothing in front of Nainital. Hence, only if you have plenty of free time, you can visit this.

title: Average
review: Average, that is not a lake actually.

title: Avoid artificial lake
review: Rip off. Crappy place. It takes effort to get to the flimsy lake with creaky boats and given its manmade, the best you could do when boating is play ring around the roses. Once youre done, the climb up the stairs reminds you of how you have been cheated of your precious time, the effort taken to climb down and back up and least important is the money paid to get to this place and go back. Avoidable.

title: Main attraction is pedal boat in the lake
review: The Mussoorie Lake also called Mussoorie Jheel is located on way to entering Mussoorie. The main attraction is pedal boat in the lake where you can enjoy boating

title: very average location...
review: The place is clean but not really a great place to visit, specially when you  have travelled all the way to Mussoorie

title: Fantastic
review: Really had a great time with the family.

title: Food is good here
review: Paragliding and adventure sports are near to place and this has also place to have tasty food with economical rate

title: Too much crowded..
review: the lake is too crowded, you can do boating in your local area as well, right? why go so far to see such a crowded place..

title: Small Artificial Pool
review: Mussoorie Lake is not worthy of being called that, a lake. It falls on the way to mussoorie, though our visit was on the way back from Mussoorie to Delhi (a 20 min drive)

title: Not Lake, Pond
review: The smallest and closed lake I had ever seen. If you have seen real Lakes, then what you see in Mussorie is not a Lake.

title: Small lake
review: This is small artifical lake on the way to Mussoorie. You can enjoy boating in this lake. Good to visit  with small children.

title: terrible
review: Not a lake  but a dirty pond...Please avoid at all cost.. Time waste...Misleading to state it is a lake at all..

title: Clean and calm
review: Like all other lakes this one is the same, beautiful , calm, clean and calling the visitors always, nice air

title: Not worthy ever for its 12 rupees entry fee
review: If not for the zip line the place has nothing. The lake is ever smaller than a swimming pool and they have boating in that.

title: Average place, can be avoided
review: Just another average place with a small artificial lake. Water is dirty. Has small shops & few activities around.

title: Its a man-made pond
review: Could have been done in a societies common plot! No nature. No beauty. No charm. On the top of it, people boat in it.

title: Visit to mussorrie
review: Mussorrie lake is not at all a place worth to visit in mussorrie. Lake water is dirty. Boting experience is not good

title: Really good place for fun and family.
review: A place where beauty is mixed with adventure.here paragliding and many other adventurous activities are present.

title: Average!
review: This place is great for children. Not a recommended place for adults as there is nothing much to do. The staff for activities need to be more trained. Someone got hurt a little in some activity.

title: Avoid
review: Pathetic place..  The lake is of the size of a swimming pool..  No need to go there unless you have nothing better to do

title: very small lake
review: we waste our time to visit here.. it is very small lake.10 rs entry fee and boating charges extra. visit if you have spare time or you want to boating in small lake.

title: Average place.
review: It is a small lake and you may not find it good to boat in it. There is zip line and paragliding available. Coming back from lake will be tiring so make trip accordingly.

title: Commercially developed place!
review: The place is kind of better than average. Some nice activities around the lake and some food shops. But can be visited if everything on the to-do list is check marked!

title: again for timepass
review: this place is bascially for timepass nothing to see much.

title: Complete waste of time
review: Being one of the major tourist attractions in Massoorie, we visited the lake during our trip. To be honest, it's just a pond with a couple of gift shops and eateries around it. Complete waste of time and money.

title: Artificial  lake
review: This the artificial lake for entertaining  the tourist ,it is a paid place to enjoy the lake in boats.

title: Artificial lake ..  not worth
review: You can get all those boating and kids fun in the city also. If you want to do Zipline (adventure sport) then visit.

title: Awesome Place for visit
review: Very beautiful lake on the way to Mussoorie.

title: It's a good place to hang out with peeps
review: Visited with my 5 friends. Had fun boating there. The little shops near by  offers you good thing to buy

title: Nothing Special
review: This is a artificial lake.The entry fee is 10 rupees.Extra charges are applicable for boating.Not good to see this lake.As I belong to Bhopal (The city of lakes),Mussoorie Lake doesn't impress me.

title: If you want to enjoy boating
review: This is a small lake, entry fees is Rs. 10 each. You have to go down about 80 steps to reach there. One can enjoy boating with family. Scary house and other attractions are also there. ZIP line is also there but too costly.

title: Small Lake
review: Mussoorie lake is little far away from Mall road. It is a small lake and you need to pay a small amount to get entry. You can enjoy boating here if you want.

title: Worst scenic point in Mussorie
review: Super small & very dirty pool...which they call lake ..unworthy of time/money/energy....no activuty ..not recommended at alll

title: Not sure why it is called a lake
review: Very disappointing to see a small water body to be called a lake. Don't waste your time there. May be have a quick glimpse on the way to Dehradun

title: LAKE..Not much more than a muddy pond, and a small one.
review: I have passed by here many time en route to or coming from Mussooire.  This trip up I decided to see for myself.  I suppose if you live in a large city or elsewhere where water is not available en mass , e.g. a REAL lake or Pond, then this tiny puddle might be of interest to you.  A wasted 10 Rupees.  Of interest to me is from whence comes this water from further up and where does it go after being used in this ‘holding area’ euphemistically called a Lake.

title: Some ponds are bigger than this 'lake'
review: I had heard of the Mussoorie lake and went to see it. It is just not worth going down the mountain or climbing back as it is just a moderate sized pond than a lake with a few shops around it. Unimaginative planning has made this uninteresting. Will skip this if I go to Mussoorie again.

title: Nice place to visit
review: It's a small lake but you can enjoyed here boating, beautiful site seeing. You can enjoy here a rope way. Many photo studios captured your memory in this place and give you a golden period of your life.

title: Just an artificial mini lake with boating facility & other adventure sports
review: Located 6 Kms from Mussoorie, this artificial mini lake offers boating facility along with other adventure sports like ZipLine, Para Sailing etc on clear days.

title: Nice Lake
review: This artificial lake is famous for boating activity.The cloudy weather and beautiful atmosphere here are also enjoyable.

title: Nothing great
review: Very small, man made (artificial ) lake.. nothing much to do here, except that it is surrounded by small hills

title: Not a lake. Pond perhaps.
review: Dont know why it is called a lake. It is like a big swimming pool. One cant swim there too. The only attraction at this place is the adventure sports like Paragliding, Zippling etc. I suggest that it should be made a water park. So that it will be more helpful.

title: liked it
review: We liked stopping by and enjoying boat ride here.  Though it is a small lake but still you can enjoy activities here.

title: Delhi To Mussoorie
review: Thanks to guruji travels it was a memorable trip to mussoorie. The transportation service of guruji travel is best in Delhi. It was very clean and comfortable. We have been provided with clean bottles of water.

title: Nice place for family
review: Some places are entertaining to visit. Many activities for Children. Good Shopping place with reasonable prices

title: Beautiful view
review: A very small artificial Lake between mussoorie and dehradun. There is a facility of boating and paragliding. Well, if you have planned for a long holiday have a short break over here, while going or returning from Mussoorie. Nothing very special but the sight is great. We went there a long time ago and we like it.

title: Nothing diiferent from the normal
review: This is just a joint with a maggie point which would cost you 70-90rs and most importantly, a pathethic pool with blocked flowing water for boating purposes

title: Na not worth the time
review: Dirty water to boat.

title: crowed
review: if you visit kampty fall no need to visit this lake. it is not natural lake. but many activities for children

title: Decent spot to visit with family
review: It is mostly crowded and suitable for a short visit with friends or family. The lake was clean and we enjoyed boating there.

title: Another Attraction of the Town
review: Another Attraction of the Town

title: Go only if you enjoy boating
review: I love boating and can't miss a chance to do it. That is the only reason I enjoyed this place. Otherwise you will find it average. In case boating does not appeal to you so much, there are eateries, 3-4 shops from where you can bags, souvenirs, wooden crafts, artificial jewelry etc. There is a small (semi-fake) garden for kids with statues of animals etc where you can take photos and all.. If you are with kids, they might enjoy it; its not for grown ups.

title: You MUST try the zipline!
review: Birthday celebrations started with an amazing adrenaline rush by trying out mussoorie's fastest zipline. Definitely worth a pit stop on your way to the hotel and back!

title: Crowded and dirty
review: The lake is a man made lake - 50 feet in diameter or so. Not very deep. 2-3 boats available and a couple of adventure activities like paragliding and zip-lining. Good for kids who would visit the place and have fun having food from the food stalls here. But the sheer number of people who are here would mean that you cannot sit and relax and stare into the valley. An underwhelming attraction!!

title: Touristy boat rides
review: This is a small lake made by the authorities and can be accessed 5-6 km before reaching Mussoorie on the Dehradun Road.

title: Cool and beautiful
review: This is small lake. Very beautiful and green. Very good for rest in summer season. Beautiful birds and sights.

title: A lake for the sake of calling it a lake
review: Good for those who have never seen a lake and the possible activities around. it is ok for taking a short break if you have plenty of time left at top of the mountain Mussoorie. It is on the way up from Dehradun may be it is a good idea to spent the remaining time on your way back for relaxing.

title: Nice man made lake
review: This is a nice man made lake which one encounters about 25 minutes before reaching the hill station on the main Dehradun Mussoorie road.

title: Great experience
review: Great place to take your family out. We enjoyed boating and my daughter enjoyed paragliding. we spent around 4 hours there. food in the eateries there is good..

title: A very good place at the entrance of Mussoorie
review: I visited this place in may 2015.This an artificial lake in between Mussoorie and Dehradun. We reached there too early in the morning at 7 in the morning.SO the entrance was open and there was a very nominal fee of only RS10 per person. We need to go down 50 stairs. As We reached there in the morning so shops were closed but the boat allow us to do boat riding. These were paddle driven boat Rs50 for 10 minutes and there is very good scenes for photography. Just outside the entrance there are some good shops for food

title: nothing great about this
review: an not so well managed lake with boating facilities and a park to spend some time is all i feel the lake has to offer.

title: Small artificial pond
review: Way it is advertise as a tourist spot, its not up to the mark. Its a small artificial pond with some water activities.

title: Small Nice Artificial Lake
review: It is on the way between Dehradun and Mussoorie.We purchased 20 rs Entrance Tickets.We have to go down to reach the lake and walkway is very good to  avoid slipping.It is well cleaned and Maintained.It has some pedal Boats and Paragliding,Gun shooting,Archery games are there.We purchased some items.Overall it is nice lake.

title: Amusement park
review: If you have small kids they will enjoy this place. Not much activity available except boating. There is ticket to enter

title: Dont Waste your time.
review: Its a man made pond with dirty water and some rickety boats.

title: Overrated place !!
review: Can be skipped in case of limited time. Its not a lake a small pond with boating facility. Not much options for foodies as well.

title: A small lake after all
review: Visited the lake on the last day of our trip. It has nothing much to offer. One can do peddle boating . There is a toy train to which we were not able to find the way
